files.patch: @@ -43,2 +43,3 @@ - * produced by computing {@code (1 - t) * start + t * end}. This interpolation type is usually - * applicable for numeric components. + * produced by computing {@code (1 - t) * start + t * end}. Note that this formula produces + * values less than {@code start} for {@code t < 0} and values greater than {@code end} for + * {@code t > 1}. This interpolation type is usually applicable for numeric components.
